casebody.data:
Friday, March 29, 1996

MOTION DOCKET

96-658. Adkins v. McFaul.

Cuyahoga County, No. 70210. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution/proceedings and release on bond,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of execution/proceedings and release on bond be, and hereby is, denied, effective March 28,1996.
